languages.text: {n}Улыбка опрятного молодого человека тускнеет, но только на мгновение.{/n} "Не ксеносы? Я уверен — произошла какая-то ошибка! Я обязательно проверю накладные, можете быть уверены".
{n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка опрятного молодого человека тускнеет, но только на мгновение.{/n} "Не ксеносы? Я уверен — произошла какая-то ошибка! Я обязательно проверю накладные, можете быть уверены".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."
{n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."
{n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."
{n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."
{n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."

languages.text: {n}男の笑顔が曇ったが、一瞬で元の表情に戻った。{/n}「異種族ではない…ですと？どこかで間違えたんでしょうかねえ！すぐに輸送書類を確認します」
languages.original_text: {n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."

traits.locale_text: {n}男の笑顔が曇ったが、一瞬で元の表情に戻った。{/n}「異種族ではない…ですと？どこかで間違えたんでしょうかねえ！すぐに輸送書類を確認します」

languages.text: {n}男人的笑容黯淡下来，但只持续了一瞬间。{/n}“你说这些不是异形？我相信，这肯定哪里搞错了！我会亲自检查货运单的，你放心吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."

traits.locale_text: {n}男人的笑容黯淡下来，但只持续了一瞬间。{/n}“你说这些不是异形？我相信，这肯定哪里搞错了！我会亲自检查货运单的，你放心吧。”

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa del hombre se atenúa, pero solo durante unos instantes.{/n} «¿Que no son xenos, dice? Debe de haber algún error. Dé por hecho que repasaré la lista de mercancía personalmente».
languages.original_text: {n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa del hombre se atenúa, pero solo durante unos instantes.{/n} «¿Que no son xenos, dice? Debe de haber algún error. Dé por hecho que repasaré la lista de mercancía personalmente».

languages.text: {n}Le sourire de l'homme s'efface, mais réapparaît bien vite.{/n} « Des mutants, vous dites ? Quelqu'un aurait-il commis une erreur ? Je vais consulter le registre des livraisons pour vérifier, vous en avez ma parole. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire de l'homme s'efface, mais réapparaît bien vite.{/n} « Des mutants, vous dites ? Quelqu'un aurait-il commis une erreur ? Je vais consulter le registre des livraisons pour vérifier, vous en avez ma parole. »

languages.text: {n}Das Lächeln des Mannes schwindet, aber nur für einen Moment.{/n} "Keine Xenos, sagt Ihr? Da muss ein Fehler vorliegen! Ich werde die Frachtliste persönlich überprüfen, da könnt Ihr sicher sein."
languages.original_text: {n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Lächeln des Mannes schwindet, aber nur für einen Moment.{/n} "Keine Xenos, sagt Ihr? Da muss ein Fehler vorliegen! Ich werde die Frachtliste persönlich überprüfen, da könnt Ihr sicher sein."

languages.text: {n}Adamın gülümsemesi kayboluyor ama sadece bir anlığına.{/n} "Zeno değil mi dediniz? Kesin bir yanlışlık olmuştur! Sevkiyat listelerini bizzat kontrol edeceğim, hiç merak etmeyin."
languages.original_text: {n}The man's smile dims, but only for a moment.{/n} "Not xenos, you say? I'm sure there must be some mistake! I will check the shipping list myself, rest assured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın gülümsemesi çok kısa bir anlığına soluyor.{/n} "Zeno değil mi dediniz? Eminim bir yanlışlık olmalı! Sevkiyat dosyalarını bizzat kontrol edeceğim, hiç merak etmeyin."
